thread.title: Breaking: Obama Threatens to Defund Military | Obama
thread.title_full: Breaking: Obama Threatens to Defund Military | Obama

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Breaking: Obama Threatens to Defund Military | Obama
text:
(Before It's News) Obama Says he Will Defund Military if GITMO is not Shutdown
On Monday, the Obama administration announced that President Obama would veto a defense authorization bill if it did not close down Guantanamo Bay. White House press secretary Josh Earnest explained that the House funding bill would be vetoed “principally because…of the irresponsible way that it funds our national defense priorities, but also because of the efforts to prevent the closure [of] the prison at Guantanamo Bay.”
Read the Full Story at The Real Strategy.
